name: AI for WooCommerce
author: MoMo Themes

sections.description:
Read the documentation for guidance : http://momothemes.com/documentationWooContentFree/

This WordPress plugin, powered by OpenAI\’s GPT language model, is an innovative tool that makes it easy for WooCommerce store owners to generate high-quality product descriptions for their products. This plugin integrates seamlessly with the WooCommerce platform and leverages the power of GPT-3 to generate engaging and professional product descriptions that can help increase the visibility and credibility of the store\’s products.

The plugin is user-friendly and requires minimal setup. Store owners can easily select the products they want to generate descriptions for, and the plugin will generate the descriptions in just a few clicks.

One of the key benefits of using this plugin is that it saves time and resources. Store owners no longer need to spend hours writing product descriptions manually, freeing up their time to focus on other aspects of their business.

Learn about OpenAI here : OpenAI

This is the link to the API: API

Learn about OpenAi’s Terms of use : Terms of use

Read about their privacy policy : Privacy Policy
sections.installation:
This plugin can be installed directly from your site.

  1. Log in and navigate to Plugins & Add New.
  2. Type \”OpenAI GPT3 Auto Product Description Writer\” into the Search input and click the \”Search\” button.
  3. Locate the \”OpenAI GPT3 Auto Product Description Writer\” in the list of search results and click \”Install Now\”.
  4. Click the \”Activate Plugin\” link at the bottom of the install screen.

It can also be installed manually.

i) To install plugin directly from the admin area. Download the plugin to your computer, then log in to your WP admin area and go to Plugins > Add New.
ii) In the new page, click on “Upload Plugin” button on top and then click on “Choose File”. Locate the plugin zip file in your computer and then press “Install Now” button.
iii) Once everything is ready, in the next page, click on “Activate Plugin” button.
sections.changelog:
v1.2.1

  • Added: Multi images (gallery)(Premium)
  • Added: Romanian Language
  • Added: Setting action hooks
  • Added: Recomendation Products
  • Update: Freemius v2.7.0

v1.2.0

  • Added: Freemius

v1.1.5

  • Removed: Models (DaVinci, Curie, Babbage, Ada)
  • Added: Image Generation

v1.1.4

  • Added: GPT-4
  • Added: Check for WP_Error

v1.1.3

  • Added: 3.5 turbo model

v1.1.2

  • Added: Ada Model

v1.1.1

  • Added: Babbage Model

v1.1.0

  • Tested upto WordPress v6.3
  • Added: Language Model choice options.
  • Added: Curie Model.

v1.0.0

  • Initial Release
sections.reviews:
great

By rachelstrmp on February 25, 2024

nice idea

Plugin no longer working

By Usama A (maxpaynestory) on January 26, 2024

All the models you are using from OpenAI have been deprecated and all I got were these errors.

The model text-davinci-003 has been deprecated, learn more here: https://platform.openai.com/docs/deprecationsThe model text-davinci-003 has been deprecated, learn more here: https://platform.openai.com/docs/deprecationsThe model text-davinci-003 has been deprecated, learn more here: https://platform.openai.com/docs/deprecat
